questionInfo: Which among the following correctly defines the term cookie?
correctAnswer: It is a message given to a web browser by a web server

It is a password stored by web server
It is virus that corrupts other web file
It is intentionally created deceptive message that collects user’s personal information
reason: The browser stores the message (i.e. cookie) in a text file.

correctAnswer: A file is a named location which stores data or information permanently.
reason: A file is a named location which stores data or information permanently. A file is always stored inside a storage device using file name (e.g. STUDENT.MARKS). A file name normally has primary and secondary name separated by a “.”(DOT).
